pr_title: Update slashing-protection interchange format version to v.5.

timeline.message:
Update slashing-protection interchange format version to v.5.

The difference is 'interchange_format' is no longer required. If you have v.4 and want to import it with v.5, delete that field from metadata, and update the version.

fixes #3197

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't seem ideal. If the only change is removing this field, can we support both version 4 and 5 and just mark the field optional?
timeline.author: ajsutton

timeline.message:
make interchange-format optional rather than removing it.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

make interchange-format optional rather than removing it.

allow v.4 or v.5 to be taken in, it's only the interchange_format that's been removed.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
